data.title: 42 celebrity couples with huge age differences between them
data.meta_description: Jay-Z and Beyoncé and Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds are just two May-December romances that are standing the test of time.
data.text:
This story is available exclusively to Business Insider subscribers. Become an Insider and start reading now. Have an account? .

Some celebrity couples have large gaps between them.

Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra Jonas are 10 years apart.

Dick Van Dyke and his wife Arlene Silver are separated by 46 years.

Advertisement

Chris Pratt and Katherine Schwarzenegger: 10 years

Katherine Schwarzenegger, 33, married 44-year-old "Avengers" star Chris Pratt in a low-key ceremony on June 8, 2019.

The two had been engaged since January 2019 and were reportedly dating for many months before that.

The couple shared matching posts to their Instagram accounts after their wedding ceremony. Both called it "the best day of our lives" and said they feel "nothing but blessed."

The couple welcomed their first child together, a daughter named Lyla Maria Schwarzenegger Pratt, in August 2020.

Their second child, a daughter named Eloise Christina Schwarzenegger Pratt, was born in May 2022.

Advertisement

Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra Jonas: 10 years

The 31-year-old singer and 41-year-old actor made their first public appearance together in 2017, a year before they began dating.

In an interview with Jimmy Kimmel, Chopra said that she and Jonas were both wearing Ralph Lauren to the Met Gala, so they decided to attend the event together. She described the night as "fun," but didn't reveal much of anything else until much later.

They married in December 2018 in multiple ceremonies.

The couple's first child together, a daughter named Malti Marie, was born via surrogate in 2022.

Advertisement

Nikki Reed and Ian Somerhalder: 10 years

Reed, 35, and Somerhalder, 44, started their relationship in 2014. They were engaged in early 2015 and were married in April of that same year. The couple welcomed their daughter Bodhi Soleil in July 2017.

Their second child, a son whose name hasn't been revealed yet, was born in their home in 2023.

Advertisement

Adam Levine and Behati Prinsloo: 10 years

Levine, 44, married Victoria's Secret model Prinsloo, 35, in 2014. Prinsloo gave birth to their first child, a daughter named Dusty Rose, in 2016 and their second daughter, Gio Grace, in 2018.

The couple's third child, a son, was born in January 2023.

Advertisement

Blake Lively and Ryan Reynolds: 11 years

Reynolds, 47, and Lively, 36, met and became friends while filming "Green Lantern" about a year before they officially started dating in 2011. They married in 2012.

The happily married couple has four children. Their first three children, all girls, are named James, Ines, and Betty. Details about their fourth child, reportedly born in February, are unknown.

Michael Fassbender and Alicia Vikander: 11 years

Vikander, 35, and Fassbender, 46, started dating after meeting on the set of "The Light Between Oceans." They married in a secret ceremony in 2017.

Advertisement

Jay-Z and Beyoncé: 12 years

Beyoncé, 42, and Jay-Z, 53, first started dating back in 2001 before tying the knot on April 4, 2008. Blue Ivy Carter was born in 2012, and the couple welcomed twins, Rumi and Sir, in June 2017.

Advertisement

William H. Macy and Felicity Huffman: 12 years

"Desperate Housewives" actor Huffman, 60, and "Shameless" star Macy, 73, dated on and off for 15 years before marrying in 1997. They have two daughters.

Advertisement

Viola Davis and Julius Tennon: 12 years

Davis, 58, has been married to Tennon, 69, since 2003. The couple adopted a daughter in 2011. Tennon has two kids from previous relationships.

Advertisement

Stephen Moyer and Anna Paquin: 13 years

"True Blood" costars Moyer, 54, and Paquin, 41, started dating while filming the first season of the HBO show, which ran from 2008 to 2014.

They were married in August 2010 and had fraternal twins, Charlie and Poppy, in September 2012. Moyer has two other kids, Billy and Lilac, from a previous marriage.

Advertisement

Camila Alves and Matthew McConaughey: 13 years

McConaughey, 54, met model Alves, 41, in 2006. He proposed on Christmas in 2011, and the couple married in June 2012. They have three kids: sons Levi and Livingston and daughter Vida.

Matt Bomer and Simon Halls: 13 years

Bomer, 46, and publicist Halls, 59, married in 2011. They have three sons.

Advertisement

Ellen DeGeneres and Portia de Rossi: 15 years

DeGeneres, 65, and de Rossi, 50, have been together since 2004 and tied the knot in 2008 after the same-sex marriage ban in California was overturned.

Advertisement

Daryl Hannah and Neil Young: 15 years

Hannah, 62, and Young, 78, got married in 2018. Young confirmed the news in November of that year when he shared a video online urging fans to vote and referred to Hannah as his "wife."

People reported that the couple had two separate ceremonies: one on Young's yacht and another in California. They started dating in 2014.

Advertisement

Hilarie Burton and Jeffrey Dean Morgan: 16 years

"One Tree Hill" actor Burton, 41, and "The Walking Dead" star Morgan, 57, started dating in 2009 and officially got married in 2019. They have one son and a daughter.

Advertisement

Heidi Klum and Tom Kaulitz: 16 years

Model Klum, 50, started dating Tokio Hotel guitarist Kaulitz, 34, in 2018. Klum opened up to InStyle about how dating a man 17 years her junior makes people bring up age more.

"My boyfriend is many years younger than me, and lots of people are questioning that and asking about it," she said. "That's really the only time when age seems to be shoved in my face and I have to give an answer for it. I don't really think about it that much otherwise."

The couple got legally married in early 2019 and had a formal ceremony in Italy in August 2019.

Advertisement

Amal and George Clooney: 17 years

George, 62, met international human-rights lawyer Amal, 45, at a dinner party hosted by a mutual friend in 2013. The couple tied the knot in Italy in 2014 and welcomed twins, Ella and Alexander, in June 2017.

Eddie Murphy and Paige Butcher: 18 years

Murphy, 62, and Butcher, 44, have been together since 2012 and became engaged in 2018. The couple has two kids together, a son Max named and a daughter named Izzy.

Advertisement

Amber Tamblyn and David Cross: 19 years

Tamblyn, 40, married comedian Cross, 59, in 2012. The couple welcomed a daughter, Marlow, in 2017.

Advertisement

Rosie Huntington-Whiteley and Jason Statham: 20 years

Actor Statham, 56, and model-actor Huntington-Whiteley, 36, started dating in 2010. The couple got engaged in 2016 and welcomed their first child, Jack Oscar, in June 2017.

Their second baby, a daughter named Isabella James Statham, was born in February 2022.

Advertisement

Annette Bening and Warren Beatty: 21 years

Bening, 65, and Beatty, 86, met in 1991 while filming the gangster drama "Bugsy." The two married in 1992 and have four kids together.

Harrison Ford and Calista Flockhart: 22 years

Ford, 81, and Flockhart, 59, first met at the 2002 Golden Globe Awards. They married in 2010 and have an adopted son.

Advertisement

Sylvester Stallone and Jennifer Flavin: 22 years

Stallone, 77, and Flavin, 55, have been married since 1997. They first met in 1988, but Stallone ended the relationship in 1994 after having an affair with Janice Dickinson. They reconciled in 1995 and now have three daughters: Sophia Rose, Sistine Rose, and Scarlet Rose.

Advertisement

Sam and Aaron Taylor-Johnson: 23 years

"Avengers: Age of Ultron" and "Bullet Train" actor Aaron Johnson, 33, met director Sam Taylor-Wood, 56, when he starred in her movie "Nowhere Boy." He was 18 at the time of its release.

In a 2019 interview with Harper's Bazaar, the couple said that they were professional on the set of the 2009 movie.

"But everyone on set knew," Sam told the publication. "And as soon as we finished, he told me he was going to marry me. We had never been on a date, or even kissed."

"And a year to the minute after we met, exactly one year to the minute, I got down on one knee and asked her to marry me," Aaron said of proposing.

They got married in 2012 and changed their last name to Taylor-Johnson. The couple has two daughters, Wylda Rae and Romy Hero. Sam also has two daughters from a previous marriage.

In June 2022, the pair celebrated their 10th wedding anniversary by renewing their vows.

Advertisement

Bruce Willis and Emma Heming: 23 years

Willis, 68, married model Heming, 45, in 2009. They have two daughters: Mabel Ray and Evelyn Penn.

In an interview after marrying, Willis said he fell in love with Heming after one date.

"We went on one date, on the Friday before Emma was getting ready to move back to New York, and then we fell mad crazy in love," Willis said.

Advertisement

Brittany Furlan and Tommy Lee: 24 years

Motley Crue drummer Lee, 61, got engaged to social media star Furlan, 37, on Valentine's Day 2018. The couple announced their marriage on the same holiday the following year, with a post on Instagram that featured their dogs dressed as a bride and groom.

"Holy shitballs!!!! We did it!!! Mr. & Mrs. Lee," Lee wrote.

Advertisement

Michael Douglas and Catherine Zeta-Jones: 25 years

Zeta-Jones, 54, and Douglas, 79, share the same birthday. The two were introduced at the Deauville Film Festival in 1998, married in November 2000, and have two kids. The couple briefly separated in 2013, but are now back together.

Alec and Hilaria Baldwin: 26 years

Alec, 65, married yoga instructor Hilaria, 39, in 2012. The couple has seven children together. Baldwin also has a daughter named Ireland Baldwin from his previous marriage to Kim Basinger.

Advertisement

Dane Cook and Kelsi Taylor: 27 years

Cook, a 51-year-old comedian, has a large age gap with the 24-year-old singer and fitness instructor. The couple has been dating since 2017 and flew to Hawaii for a romantic vacation in early 2018. In February 2021, she called him her "soulmate."

Cook proposed to Taylor in July 2022 after five years together. They got married in Hawaii in September.

Advertisement

Hayley Roberts and David Hasselhoff: 27 years

After two years of being engaged, Roberts, 43, and Hasselhoff, 71, tied the knot in July 2018.

Hasselhoff told OK! Magazine that he did have some concerns about their age gap when they started dating.

"For the longest time I didn't think it was right to marry Hayley as I was so much older and I didn't want to take away the fun and the youth and the excitement of growing old together and having children," he said.

Advertisement

Sarah Paulson and Holland Taylor: 31 years

"American Horror Story" star Paulson, 48, has been dating the 80-year-old Taylor since early 2015. Paulson confirmed their relationship in an interview with the New York Times in 2016.

Advertisement

Emilie Livingston and Jeff Goldblum: 31 years

Goldblum, 71, married gymnast Livingston, 41, married in 2014 and have since had two sons, the second having joined the family in April 2017.

Advertisement

Kitty Spencer and Michael Lewis: 32 years

The 32-year-old model was photographed with 64-year-old businessman Lewis in New York City in May 2019.

She and Lewis got married in Frascati, Italy in July 2021.

Advertisement

Dennis Quaid and Laura Savoie: 39 years

Quaid, 69, got engaged to 30-year-old PhD student Laura Savoie in 2019. The two had been dating for the past few months prior to the proposal. They wed in 2020.

In a 2020 interview with People, the couple said that their faith was "the greatest source of strength in our relationship."

"It was love at first sight," Quaid said of their first meeting.

"I just love who she is as a person," he said. "Her character, her intelligence, of course, her beauty. And her point of view of the world."

Advertisement

Alejandra Silva and Richard Gere: 34 years

It was revealed in April 2018 that Gere, 74, and Silva, 40, secretly married "weeks and weeks ago," People confirmed. The two have been dating since 2014.

They welcomed a son in February 2019 and Silva reportedly gave birth to their second child in 2020.

Advertisement

David Foster and Katharine McPhee: 34 years

Foster, 74, and McPhee, 39, got engaged in 2018 while on an Italian vacation. They tied the knot in June 2019 and welcomed their first child together, son Rennie David Foster, in 2021.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Cher and Alexander "AE" Edwards: 36 years

According to Cher, she and Edwards met during Paris Fashion Week in early 2022. They sparked romance rumors when paparazzi caught them holding hands after having dinner with the rapper Tyga in November 2022.

Cher later confirmed that he's her boyfriend by replying to a fan's comment from a fan that month.

The legendary singer has since responded to negative comments online at various times.

"On paper This Looks strange (Even 2 ME) A.E Says [love] Doesn't Know Math," she tweeted in late November 2022.

In a separate tweet to a fan, Cher described her boyfriend as "kind," "smart," and "hilarious." She also said that they kiss "like teenagers."

The singer also commented on their relationship during an appearance on "The Kelly Clarkson Show" in December 2022.

"Well, on paper it's kind of ridiculous," she said. "But in real life, we get along great. He's fabulous and I don't give men qualities that they don't deserve."

"He's very kind, he's very smart, he's very talented and he's really funny and I think he's quite handsome," she added.

Advertisement

Patrick Stewart and Sunny Ozell: 38 years

Stewart, 83, married jazz singer Ozell, 44, in 2013 after dating for roughly five years. The two met when Stewart was performing in "Macbeth" at the Brooklyn Academy of Music.

Mick Jagger and Melanie Hamrick: 44 years

Jagger, 80, and Hamrick, a ballerina who's approximately 36, have been together since 2014. They have a son named Deveraux.

Advertisement

Arlene Silver and Dick Van Dyke: 46 years

Van Dyke, 97, married makeup artist Silver, 52, in 2012 after meeting her six years earlier at the SAG Awards.

Advertisement

Don McLean and Paris Dylan: 49 years

"American Pie" singer McLean, 78, is dating 29-year-old model Dylan. She shared an image on her Instagram of the two of them in Paris in 2018 and captioned the photo, "A dream with my love." They've been posting photos together since November 2016.

"She is the most wonderful person that I have ever known," McLean told People of his girlfriend.

Anjelica Oswald contributed to a previous version of this article.
